On the other, you have its twin.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it

Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.
